releaseNotes:
1.5.5
- Add online photos to page background.
- Add stickers from online collection.
- Change color of your stickers.
- Search bg and photos in Pixabay's huge collection.

1.5.3
- Browse photo gallery with album and folder options.
- Remove watermark after watching a reward ad.
- Lock and unlock layers to stop resize and move.

announcements.title: Next Version is exciting
announcements.description:
New features are coming to next update.
- Guidelines for layout.
- Layer list order, hide, lock.
- Make your own gradient color.
- Save more projects after watching ads.
-Rounded background, with gradient.
